info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 6:32PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Bladen, Robeson, northwestern Dillon, northeastern Darlington and Marlboro Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 632 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Fayetteville to 8 miles north of Wallace. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lumberton, Bennettsville, Red Springs, Pembroke, Maxton, Mccoll, St. Pauls, Rowland, Clio, Rex, Ammon, Hestertown, Shannon, Chavistown, White Oak, Minturn, Smiths, Howellsville, Raemon and Auburn. This includes Interstate 95 in North Carolina between mile markers 3 and 38. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
